briefdescription.para: < Start of include guard for TOOLS_TOOLS_H.

detaileddescription.para: Definition of TOOLS_TOOLS_H to signify the header has been included. Include standard I/O library for console output. Include standard string library for string manipulation. Include standard vector container for sequence storage. Include fixed-width integer type definitions. Include standard map container for key-value associations.

briefdescription.para: Defines the tools class that provides general utility functions for the AnalysisG framework.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the declaration of the tools class, which serves as a base class for many components in the AnalysisG framework. It provides a wide range of utility functions for file operations, string manipulations, container operations, type handling, and more. Inheriting from this class grants access to these commonly used functionalities.
